about_the_game:
Bloodletter is a strategic management deckbuilder inspired by tarot cards, medieval manuscripts, healing methods of the time and the superstitions surrounding them. All that stands between the entities’ all consuming corruption and the village’s survival is the sanctuary of your bathhouse.

Take up the mantle of a barber surgeon and use your deck of cards to heal villagers from last night’s attack on their minds as well as prepare them for the next night to come. 

In the evening In return for alleviating their suffering, they offer you new healing methods and their unique deck building abilities. Be mindful of how you treat them, if they don’t trust you, they won’t help you.  

Before your arrival the villagers were at ominous forces’ mercy. Choose what entity you will try to slay and rid the village of its influence.

GAME FEATURES:

  • 80+ cards with unique effects, illustrations and names

  • 6 blessing and curse cards that can impact your run drastically 

  • 10 villagers with their own deck building abilities, bizarre illustrations and animations

  • 4 different entities with distinct win conditions 

  • 1 fantastical medieval world to immerse yourself in

short_description: Bloodletter is a medieval deck builder all about customizing your unique deck to influence villagers’ stats to protect them from mysterious entities’ torment. In return utilise the villager’s unique deck-building abilities to enhance your healing methods, may your dubious methods work!
